question: BRICS-themed subway train has started test operations in __________.
explanation: A BRICS-themed subway train with carriages representing the five member nations - Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa - has started test operations in China's south-eastern Xiamen city on October 6, 2017. It has six carriages, five of which represents different cultures of the BRICS countries. The Indian carriage depicts elephants and yoga.
